headline: Hubbell to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conference
summary: Shelton, CT, Feb. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hubbell Incorporated (NYSE: HUBB) today announced that Gerben Bakker, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, and Joe Capozzoli, Chief Financial Officer, will appear at the Barclays Industrial Select Conference. The event will be webcast and is scheduled to begin at 8:40AM ET on Thursday, February 19, 2026. The live audio of the event will be available and can be accessed by visiting Hubbell's Investor Relations section. You can also access this infor
